plot: Seong-a's desire for Hyeong-wook defies all social conventions. Depsite being fired from their respective jobs over their adulterous relationship, they decide to further shock the community by moving in together.
title: Aggimeobshi baehari
plot_es: Seong-a's desire for Hyeong-wook defies all social conventions. Depsite being fired from their respective jobs over their adulterous relationship, they decide to further shock the community by moving in together.
plot_en: Seong-a's desire for Hyeong-wook defies all social conventions. Depsite being fired from their respective jobs over their adulterous relationship, they decide to further shock the community by moving in together.
